1052790.name: TRPG in VR Space
1052790.description:
[Important] Notice of TRPG in VR Space service end
TRPG in VR Space will be discontinued on May 31, 2020.
As of May 31, 2020, you will not be able to access all of the services.

You can play TRPG in VR space. The TRPG in VR Space can be played as if everyone is playing in the same place if they attach VR devices in their own room even if they do not gather in the same place. If you log in with your friends 24 hours a day, it is your only play space.
- Dice, miniatures and some avatars are available in the VR room.
- You can create maps and character sheets for games, and you can see them in the VR room.
- You can check the rulebook at hand with the camera attached to the HMD or the webcam connected to the PC.
